titleStmt.title: A draught of eternitie. Written in French by Iohn Peter Camus Bishope of Belley. Translated into English by Miles Car preist of the English Colledge of Doway
Crayon de l'eternité. English
titleStmt.author: Camus, Jean-Pierre, 1584-1652.
Carre, Thomas, 1599-1674.

publicationStmt.publisher: By the widowe of Marke Wyon, at the signe of the Phœnix,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: A draught of eternity.
Reproduction of the original in the Union Theological Seminary (New York, N.Y.). Library.
